name: King Of the Roots
description:
You are a root, and you want to go back home. However, there is only one place available. So I guess you'll have to fight for it.

Choose your vegetable and stab your way to the shiny spot in the ground. You can also throw seeds with different effects. There can only be one king of the roots!

V1.2 is controller compatible

Controls - Game Jam Version Player 1 Player 2 move arrow keys WASD (brief) shovel attack (hold) throw seed K F hold -  (on shiny spot) get rooted (elsewhere) swap weapon L Q Controls - V1.2 Player 1  keyboard Player 2 keyboard Controller move arrow keys WASD Left stick / D-Pad shovel attack (hold) throw seed K F A swap seed type (on shiny spot) root yourself) L E X

Made in 48h for Global Game Jam 2023

Credits : Maxime, Olivia, Theodor, Alkam, Adarsh & Jean
